tool_description: Analyzes search query patterns, success rates, failed searches, and query clustering to understand user information needs and search effectiveness.

search_queries.description: List of search queries from usage data

search_results.description: Corresponding search results for each query

cluster_similar_queries.description: Whether to group similar queries together

analyze_intent.description: Whether to perform search intent analysis

error_messages: Query-result mismatch: search_queries and search_results arrays must have the same length
Empty queries: search_queries array cannot be empty
Invalid frequency: min_query_frequency must be a positive integer
Processing failed: Unable to analyze search query patterns
usage: Input search_queries and corresponding search_results arrays. Enable cluster_similar_queries for grouping, set min_query_frequency threshold, and optionally enable intent analysis.

total_queries.description: Total number of search queries analyzed

successful_queries.description: Number of queries that returned results
